comments:
Build I20050509-2010 

To repro:

1. Create simple project
2. Create file a.xml:

<project name="a">
	<import file="b.xml"/>
	<target name="t1"/>
</project>

3. Create file b.xml:

<project name="b">
	<target name="t2">
	</target>
</project>

4. Open the Ant View
5. Drag a.xml to the ant view.
6. Expand the root node.
7. Right-click target t2 and open with ant editor
8. Observe NullPointerException in error log.


!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2005-05-10 13:39:40.501
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Path.<init>(Path.java:152)
	at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.AntUtil.getFileForLocation(AntUtil.java:510)
	at
org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.model.AntElementNode.getIFile(AntElementNode.java:553)
	at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.views.AntView.addOpenWithMenu(AntView.java:237)
	at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.views.AntView.fillContextMenu(AntView.java:224)
	at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.views.AntView.access$2(AntView.java:223)
	at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.views.AntView$2.menuAboutToShow(AntView.java:207)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.MenuManager.fireAboutToShow(MenuManager.java:285)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:847)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control.WM_INITMENUPOPUP(Control.java:3336)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control.windowProc(Control.java:3064)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Decorations.windowProc(Decorations.java:1493)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Menu._setVisible(Menu.java:225)

	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.PlatformActivator$1.run(PlatformActivator.java:230)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.run(EclipseStarter.java:345)

	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
	at
sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:585)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.invokeFramework(Main.java:328)

	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:950)

The problem here was the target with no child tasks.
The AntModel was relying (incorrectly) on targets having children to set the 
external file path.
This was a hold over from the days when targets did not have their own target 
information (pre Ant 1.6.2 I believe).

Fixed in the AntModel
